title: A Land fit for heroes
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Australia - Rural conditions
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Australia - Rural conditions
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television series - Australia

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Rural development - Australia
description: Episode of Series "Big country". Examines the harsh reality that lay behind the concept of parcelling out plots of land for soldiers returning from both the first and second world wars. Uses archival footage, interviews and old radio broadcasts. Reporter - Ron Iddon. Suitable for secondary level.
